credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Project for a decorative vase
provenance: From the Collection of Giovanni Piancastelli; Mr and Mrs Edward D. Brandegee
medium: Brush and brown wash, pen and ink
description: An amphora, seen diagonally.  Around the body and the neck an ivy branch.  At the end of the handles a satyr mask.  The background tinted light brown; the shadow is indicated.  On the back written in pencil: "con matteo nosselli 12."
name: Drawing
